enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: Delegates met briefly in a contact group and agreed to a draft COP/MOP decision on further guidance relating to the CDM.
The text contains five sections covering general issues, governance, methodologies and additionality, regional distribution and capacity building, and resources for work.

It encourages the CDM Executive Board to emphasize its executive and supervisory role, simplify operational aspects of the CDM while ensuring environmental integrity and further improve its functions to ensure a fair and equitable regulatory system.
It requests the Board to promote the quality of validation and verification work and improve the substantiation of its decisions.
The decision addresses several methodological issues, including non-renewable biomass.
It abolishes the CDM levy and registration fee for projects in LDCs and contains several paragraphs on capacity building and equitable distribution of CDM projects.
